You.name: You
You.chat: Was this not a Quiz ???!! Where am i ???!!

You.name: You
You.chat: Why is this happening ??? Is this something only on my SCREEN!!?

You.name: You
You.chat: Well I was just about getting bored anyway might as well kill sometime here

You.name: You
You.chat: This whole thing was boring anyway

You.name: You
You.chat: Who is that guy there ? Lets go talk to him

npc.name: magistrate
npc.chat: Oh your here, we've been waiting for u....

npc.name: You
npc.chat: Is this one of those things?

npc.name: You
npc.chat: Am i being Kidnapped or something?

npc.name: magistrate
npc.chat: Just as when peaceful days seemed everlasting, our greatest fears returned

npc.name: magistrate
npc.chat: please haste my friend and come to me to fix the lever quick its the only way to save them now

npc.name: You
npc.chat: Hey!! Don't start monologuing out of nowhere this isn't a game.

npc.name: magistrate
npc.chat: Dear esteemed Hero, Sir i ask thee help for my village pls save them from the golem

npc.name: You
npc.chat: Great seems like a quest starts here, Uh!!! FINE Lead the way and keep this quick I want to slack off after this

npc.name: magistrate
npc.chat: Here Sire, they are by the gate whose lever is broken we must haste

npc_1.name: magistrate
npc_1.chat: Thank you for your great service Sir

npc_1.name: You
npc_1.chat: uhhh... okay i did LIETERALLY NOTHING THOUGH?

blacksmith1.name: blacksmith
blacksmith1.chat: This won't seem like an easy fix. WELP nothing we can let's go home and sleep

blacksmith1.name: You
blacksmith1.chat: Hey!! Don't go try to escape reality that quick at least give it a try

blacksmith1.name: blacksmith
blacksmith1.chat: YOU ARE IN NO POSITION TO SAY THAT!!!!

blacksmith1.name: blacksmith
blacksmith1.chat: Seems like now isn't the time to break the fourth wall.

blacksmith1.name: blacksmith
blacksmith1.chat: find me 5 gears and 3 keys then we'll talk

blacksmith1.name: You
blacksmith1.chat: That's a weird grocery list but sure ill help.

blacksmith_waiting.name: blacksmith
blacksmith_waiting.chat: Did you get the 3 Keys and 5 Gears?

blacksmith_idle.name: You
blacksmith_idle.chat: uhh.... okay talk about being unfriendly, gezzz

blacksmith_idle.name: blacksmith
blacksmith_idle.chat: Shove it you escapist kid from another world

blacksmith_idle.name: blacksmith
blacksmith_idle.chat: I know everything, now shove it ..

blacksmith2.name: blacksmith
blacksmith2.chat: Hey!! kiddo the REAL Work starts from here

blacksmith2.name: You
blacksmith2.chat: Well the faster the better is guess

blacksmith2.name: blacksmith
blacksmith2.chat: There the level should work now

golem.name: Panicking Villagers
golem.chat: OH SHOOT RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!!!!!!!.....

golem_1.name: Panicking Villagers
golem_1.chat: Hey!!!!!.. help us. The Gaurdian Golem is going to eat us

golem_1.name: Panicking Villagers
golem_1.chat: He's want to make us into his slaves PLEASE HURRY!!! KILL HIM!!!

golem_1.name: Panicking Golem
golem_1.chat: Woah there... HEY!!! WAIT DON'T I CAN EXPLAIN MYSELF!!!!

golem_1.name: You
golem_1.chat: Oh.... (you realise that the golem is being misunderstood and is panicking). Well that can certainly be arranged

golem_2.name: Golem
golem_2.chat: NOOO PLEASE SPARE ME I DID NOTHING

golem_2.name: You
golem_2.chat: Hey you Golem what's your deal with these people anyway?

golem_2.name: Golem
golem_2.chat: I am the gaurdian of the Artifact. The one singular object that has the highest authority in the world

golem_2.name: Panicking Villagers
golem_2.chat: You were the one who was meant to gaurd the Artifact and now you've abandoned your duties!!!!!

golem_2.name: Golem
golem_2.chat: I DIDN'T DO SH*T BRO!!!!!!!!!!!... It wasn't me or under my control trust me that THING JUST took control of me

golem_2.name: You
golem_2.chat: Hey Calm down all of you. Now isn't the time to be fighting we have bigger issues if that ARTIFACT has such power its first priority to get it back

golem_2.name: Golem
golem_2.chat: Yes what you have stated dear esteemed hero is true. Here climb the stairs and go to the King's palace he shall guide you to recalim the ARTIFACT

golem_2.name: You
golem_2.chat: The ARTIFACT isn't my luggage though. Welp im bored of event too anyway let's go then.

golem_idle.name: You
golem_idle.chat: What ya looking I'm just your friendly neighbourhood Golem.

king.name: King
king.chat: Oh no this is the end, we are doomed!!!!!!!!

king.name: King
king.chat: The Sacred artifact was the only line of defense and it was attacked.

king.name: You
king.chat: Ahh what's your problem and why is the rift in space the most ignored topic at the moment?

king.name: King
king.chat: That is the reamins of the battle after the ENTITY too away our Artifact to creat its own lair

king.name: You
king.chat: Well then we no time to waste then. Lets head to Battle i've been craving for some battle

king.name: King
king.chat: Not so fast!! Thou shall answer my questions before you enter the rift

king.name: You
king.chat: Does this rift require a ticket or something?
